Posts.Content: Yes i noticed it. I thought it was just a problam i was having. It drove me crazy. i started changing clothes constantly and taking like 4+ showers/baths a day. Its not just the cancer that has a smell cause mine was enhanced once I started the Chemo and radiaton treatments. Now that imn doing my own thing its so much better. it hasnt gone away completely yet but i eat very health even tho I ate healthy before. Tons of veggies, fruits and mostly everything was organic but i started eating meat with my husband but I am now trying to get off that and back to just the seafood and good stuff!
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: OH MY GOD!!! THIS POST JUST MADE MY YEAR!!!! I thought I was going crazy. I am not a germaphobe but i noticed a change in my natural body odor. I shower or bathe like 4+ times a day and am constantly changing clothes. I thought it was just me. Wow I feel do much better now.Â
